name: Cape Cod Symposium 2023
content: When it comes to treating addiction, we're stronger together. The field of addiction treatment is ever-changing, and we're focused on bringing you the best possible education. At the Cape Cod Symposium, you'll find yourself among like-minded peers, learning the latest, most effective strategies for addiction treatment and behavioral health, and addressing the significant challenges we must overcome. Join us as we rise above the challenges, reverse the numbers, and celebrate recovery. URLs: Facebook: https://go.evvnt.com/1845628-2?pid=4868 LinkedIn: https://go.evvnt.com/1845628-3?pid=4868 Instagram: https://go.evvnt.com/1845628-4?pid=4868 Time: 8:30 am - 12:00 pm Venue details: The Emerald Resort: Irish Village/HyPort Conference Center/Atlantis Sports Club, 35 Scudder Avenue, Barnstable, Massachusetts, 02601, United States Prices: Last Chance Rates - Clinical Attendees - Through August 11: USD 575.00, Last Chance Rates - Non-Clinical Attendees - Through August 11: USD 675.00, Standard Rates - Clinical Attendees: USD 649.00, Standard Rates - Non-Clinical Attendees: USD 749.00, Student/Resident/Fellow: USD 199.00 Speakers: LaTisha Bader, PhD, Eric L. Garland, PhD, Judith L. Landau, MD, DPM, LMFT, CFLE, CIP, CAI, CRS, Jerry Moe, MA, James C. Montgomery, MD, Lana L. Seiler, LCSW, Andrew Tatarsky, PhD
